author: corcoranwill
content:
Hi all - 

In anticipation for the first FCR breakout room call on Tuesday Jan 20 at 2pm UTC, we thought it would be a nice idea to publish a primer.  This is a an hour long workshop that <@425572898787426305>  gave during Deconnect a few months ago that includes a lot of Q&A.  

https://youtu.be/D8Kh7iD6niY

The description on YT will also link you to the presentation slides and an explainer doc.

See you all on Tuesday!
